text.emotional: It is still up for debate which of us is more proficient at woodcarving. She primarily uses basswood. If you ask me, that´s enough to end the debate right here.
text.silence: {.} it is still up for debate which of us is more proficient at woodcarving {....} she primarily uses basswood {....} if you ask me {....} that´s enough to end the debate right here {...}
